title: E7 A Menorah Made of Lava and the Jerry Springer of Germany
description: EPISODE 7 IS HERE. Em tells Christine about the terrifying Eastern State Penitentiary and all its ghostly inhabitants, and Christine tells Em about one of Germany’s most chilling cold cases of all time, the Hinterkaifeck Massacre. Get those drinks ready - you know the drill.
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
